msg: On the node_pool branch, add BRANCH-README.

author: ogrisel
msg: STANBOL-197: package empty reference solrindex config for data files provider

author: danielsh
msg: Eliminate the DAG API's NODE_POOL, step 3.4.
Remove NODE_POOL parameters from get_node_revision()'s callers, through
the end of dag.c.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/dag.h
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/dag.c
(svn_fs_fs__dag_things_different, svn_fs_fs__dag_get_copyroot,
svn_fs_fs__dag_get_copyfrom_rev, svn_fs_fs__dag_get_copyfrom_path):
Remove POOL parameters.
(svn_fs_fs__dag_get_edit_stream, svn_fs_fs__dag_copy):
Stop documenting that POOL needs to live as long as one of the dag_node_t
parameters.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/tree.c
(*): Update callers.

author: gstein
msg: Allow an environment variable (MIRRORS_LIST) to override the default
list of mirrors. This will/can be used by Apache OpenOffice to specify
the mirrors which carry the project.
* content/dyn/mirrors/mirrors.cgi:
(locate_mirrors): new helper function to find the mirrors file
(mirrorsapp): use the new helper

author: jgoodyear
msg: [KARAF-1283] Add a simple OSGi bundle demo to deployer examples.
Adding a simple bundle deployer example.
Part of Bundle -> Feature -> Kar deployment guide.
